snippet: Paul Pierce decided to return for his 19th and last season in the NBA, convinced the Los Angeles Clippers can make a successful run to their first league title....
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce decided to return for his 19th and last season in the NBA, convinced the Los Angeles Clippers can make a successful run to their first league title.

headline.main: Pierce Returns to Clippers for 19th and Last NBA Season
headline.print_headline: Pierce Returns to Clippers for 19th and Last NBA Season
